fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Financial services policy (banking, insurance, fiancial markets), digital economy policy (telecoms, data privacy, internet), media policy (governance, competition).
membership: Member of the Board of Cercle des Délégués Permanents Français (Brussels)
goals__remit:
EU issues management and reputation management services. 
 
Political mapping, policy monitoring, institutional outreach contact programmes and European media relation services to businesses and trade associations. 
 
Training and coaching on EU activity.
